## Release `<version>`

## Summary

What this release contains.

## Release Steps Verification

- [ ] `release/<version>` branch created
- [ ] `npm version` run at repo root (versions bumped correctly across packages)
- [ ] Packaging commands executed for all relevant packages
- [ ] Verified build artifacts and package integrity
- [ ] Publishing commands executed (or confirmed pending if this PR precedes publish)
- [ ] Git tag created (`<tag>`)
- [ ] Changelog reviewed/updated
- [ ] Dependencies look clean (no unexpected diffs)

## Notable Changes

Anything with user impact, breaking changes, migrations, or internal risks.

## Notes / Irregularities

Unexpected diffs, manual fixes, or things to watch on merge or publish.

## Post-Merge Tasks

- [ ] Create GitHub Release with changelog + tag
- [ ] Kick off any downstream deployment or automation
